comments.comment: E kohomada America wata Balaya thiyenne ape rata alla ganna  , Sinhalaya rata thula  sitinakam Oya Para Wideshikayanta kisi Aithiyak naha raten wali atayak wath ganna , Lankawa Winasha karanna wath Baudhdha Shasanayata atha thiyanna wath ...! Ena hama ekama hadanne ape Lankawa  hura gena Kannane .... Mona Magulakda me , Wal Thirisan Haththa , wahi nathi hena gahanne ewunta ....!  Sri-Lanka Sinhala Baudhdha Rata anith jathinuth innawa thama , ekata kamak naha kiyamuko , eth monawada me athsan karana Giwisum ....! Mama Sri-Lankan Baudhdha ape rata Lankawa ...! Therum ganilla e bawa ....!

I agree with Tissa Jananayka and all the other leaders and the citizens of Sri-Lanka that we SHOULD NOT sign any document that would enslave the people of our country. Signing of this document would be a horrible mistake that would be the result of losing our freedom and our culture. Let's take Denmark as an example. When Donald trump wanted to buy Greenland the Danish leaders said NO, Greenland is NOT for SALE!!!
Theruwan saranai ape hamuduruwane.. oba wahanselage ashirwadaya nisa thama mehama api thawama jewathwenna.. nathinam me rata winunala dala iwerai me inne moda palakayo..
